name: Middle Age Mechs (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of your first turn of the Duel, flip this card over and place it in your center Spell & Trap Zone.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
All "Ancient Gear" monsters gain 300 ATK.
Each time a monster is Normal Summoned/Set, place 1 counter on this card.
If you Tribute Summon an "Ancient Gear" monster face-up, you can Tribute this card instead, if the number of its counters is equal to or greater than the number of required Tribute(s).
